message.content:

3. The supervision was done by project staff.

7. The follow-up days were day 1, day 2, day 3, day 7, day 14, and day 28 post treatment.

messages.content:
Statement: Administration of study drugs was supervised by project staff and the children were followed up at r home on days 1,2,3,7,14 and 28 post treatment.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
